dimensions: Warp x Weft: 310 x 128 cm (10 ft. 2 1/16 in. x 50 3/8 in.)
title: Pair of portieres
medium:
Medium: cotton, silk
Technique: plain weave (cotton warp, silk chenille weft)
description: Two panels of plain golden yellow ochre with a border in cream, tan, gray, and red on dark blue ground in a pattern influenced by Turkish carpets with an allover pattern of small medallions with a border at the top and bottom. Bound on three sides by red, yellow, ivory and blue fringe.
name: Pair of portieres
